A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After The Force Awakens\, I was really excited to see how the story would develop.  Long story short... It fell completely flat!  The dialogue was cheesy to say the least\, the action scenes were pretty good\, but nothing we haven't seen in previous films.  My favorite part of the movie we're the little bird creatures in the cockpit with Chewy.  Bottom line\, the storyline was overly drawn out.  For a 2 1/2 hour long movie on IMAX 3D\, I expected a lot more for $20 per ticket!  My advice\, wait till it comes out on Netflix or Redbox!
